title: Dark Theme
other:
Replaces LLLLLLLL with one of the desired values:

40000000 -> White
3F800000 -> Default
3E800000 -> Light Grey
3D800000 -> Grey (Often used as a dark theme)
3C800000 -> Dark Grey
3B800000 -> Very Dark Grey
00000000 -> Black
